skeletonProjects.name: Bitcoind App
skeletonProjects.description: A skeleton CoinMesh project that runs bitcoin-core software.  Includes an adapter for Bitcoind with a RESTful API as well as a sample Wallet logic service for extending bitcoind-adapter functionality.

skeletonProjects.name: Litecoind App
skeletonProjects.description: A skeleton CoinMesh project that runs litecoin-core software.  Includes an adapter for Bitcoind with a RESTful API as well as a sample Wallet logic service for extending litecoind-adapter functionality.

skeletonProjects.name: Bitcoind w/ Lightning Network App
skeletonProjects.description: A skeleton CoinMesh project that runs lnd on top of bitcoin-core software.  Includes an adapter for Bitcoind with a RESTful API as well as a sample Wallet logic service for extending lnd-adapter functionality.
